about_the_game:
Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Beechcraft® V35B Bonanza®, is a beautifully detailed and accurate aircraft. Featuring an authentic virtual cockpit with realistic instruments, including Autopilot, 3D modelled pilot and original GNS 430 GPS unit. Superb exterior modelling and exacting flight dynamics - this aircraft is simply GA perfection!

Features:

  • Five different paint schemes
  • Two different models - with and without tip tanks
  • High quality digital stereo sound recorded from the original aircraft
  • Original GNS 430 GPS unit
  • Interactive virtual cockpit
  • Customisable panel for controlling seat configuration
  • Pop up V35 Bonanza manual with performance charts, and normal & emergency checklists
  • Detailed animations - propeller, doors, windows sun visor, co-pilot seat, vibrating antenna, cowl flaps, pilot and exhaust pipe

Virtual Cockpit

  • Customisable panel for controlling seat configuration
  • 3D control knobs in Virtual Cockpit
  • Realistic night lights effect on virtual cockpit
  • Autopilot
  • 3D modelled pilot, cockpit area and passenger cabin area
  • Realistic light effects on gauges
  • Night light effects on panel
  • Separate switches for instruments lights and cabin light
  • Toggle yoke

Animations & model

  • Original V35 cockpit with leather seats and custom wood inserts on interior wall panel.
  • Animations including wheel chocks, pitot cover and tail prop stand
  • Original GNS 430 GPS unit
  • External dynamic shadows, internal dynamic shadows on VC, volumetric normal mapping, specular mapping and bloom lights
  • Polygon optimised model
  • Navigation lights, landing and taxi lights
  • Accurate weight and balances

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP Service Pack 2 or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz or higher (single core)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX®9 compliant video card or greater, 256 MB video RAM or higher, Shader Model 1.1 or higher (Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection required for multiplayer features

short_description: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Beechcraft® V35B Bonanza®, is a beautifully detailed and accurate aircraft.
